description: GET /servers/xxx should return key_name value only if the keypairs extension is being used. But currently it always displays it.
title: GET /servers/xxx sets key_name value irrespective of whether keypairs extensions is used or not

comments.content: GET /servers/xxx should return key_name value only if the keypairs extension is being used. But currently it always displays it.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~iccha-sethi

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/9736

commit 26dbf7d03875e10b13d644bc75f21069cf27a671
Author: isethi <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Jul 11 19:46:25 2012 +0000

    Display key_name only if keypairs extension is used
    
    GET /servers/xxx will display the key_name only if the keypairs extension is
    being used.
    
    Fixes bug 1024986
    
    Change-Id: Ie37880f63b7595ae3dd2f3b23c6c3097dac2f57c
